# Nekton Data {.unnumbered}

## Background

Nekton data describe fish and other swimming organisms that inhabitat an estuary.  The Tampa Bay Nekton Index describes the condition of the nekton community as a single score from 0 - 100.  The dashboard provides information on index scores by major bay segments and results for individual sample stations. Data downloads are also available.

## Dashboard

View the dashboard by visiting [https://shiny.tbep.org/nekton-dash](https://shiny.tbep.org/nekton-dash){target="_blank"}
